permafrost.tundra.io

Interface DirectoryListing


  • public interface DirectoryListing
    Encapsulates the results of a directory listing.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.File getDirectory()
      Returns the directory which produced this listing.
      java.util.List<java.io.File> listAll()
      Returns all the files and directories in this listing.
      java.util.List<java.io.File> listDirectories()
      Returns all the directories in this listing.
      java.util.List<java.io.File> listFiles()
      Returns all the files in this listing.

    • Method Detail

      • listAll

        java.util.List<java.io.File> listAll()
        Returns all the files and directories in this listing.
        Returns:
        All the files and directories in this listing.

      • listDirectories

        java.util.List<java.io.File> listDirectories()
        Returns all the directories in this listing.
        Returns:
        All the directories in this listing.

      • listFiles

        java.util.List<java.io.File> listFiles()
        Returns all the files in this listing.
        Returns:
        All the files in this listing.

      • getDirectory

        java.io.File getDirectory()
        Returns the directory which produced this listing.
        Returns:
        The directory which produced this listing.
